### Colorscale for Scatter Plots

```{r}
library(plotly)

p <- plot_ly(
  type = 'scatter',
  mode='markers',
  y=rep(5, 40),
  marker=list(
    size=seq(0, 39),
    color=seq(0, 39),
    colorbar=list(
      title='Colorbar'
    ),
    colorscale='Viridis',
    reversescale =T
  )
  ) %>%
  layout(
    xaxis = list(
      showgrid = F,
      zeroline = F
    ),
    yaxis = list(
      showgrid = F,
      zeroline = F
    )
  )

p
```

### Colorscale Contour

```{r}
library(plotly)

p <- plot_ly(
  type = 'contour',
  z=matrix(c(10, 10.625, 12.5, 15.625, 20,
      5.625, 6.25, 8.125, 11.25, 15.625,
      2.5, 3.125, 5., 8.125, 12.5,
      0.625, 1.25, 3.125, 6.25, 10.625,
      0, 0.625, 2.5, 5.625, 10),
      nrow=5, ncol=5)
)

p
```
